page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Gilmerton is positioned on either side of the A85 which runs through Crieff to Perth. There are, altogether, three roads which lead into the village from the surrounding area. There is no petrol station in Gilmerton and so the villagers must travel to Crieff for petrol. Many farmers in the area have their own pumps which decreases their travelling expenses. The majority of the housing is on the north side of the A85 and difficulties are experienced by the old and the young in crossing the road to get to the bus or go to the Post Office as there is no crossing. If a crossing was developed the danger would be greatly reduced.
